cards.name: DJ Alice
cards.ability: Bass Drop – once per game, stun all opponents (-2 Energy) before comparison.

cards.name: Bob the Gamer
cards.ability: Combo Breaker – reroll one die each round.

cards.name: Charming Chloe
cards.ability: Mic Drop – steal 1 Charm from the round winner.

cards.name: Grease-Slice Pizza
cards.effect: Eat for +3 Energy this round, but -1 Charm next round.

cards.name: Spinning Disco Ball
cards.effect: Grant +4 Charm to the user this round.

cards.name: Hyper-Fizz Soda
cards.effect: Chug for +2 Energy every round until the game ends, then get -2 Charm in the final round.

rules.winCondition: First player to collect 3 Win Tokens
rules.tieBreaker: Both tied cards stay on table; each tied player rolls a d6—highest gains +2 Energy only for tie break.
